stage2.title: Regional Network

exponential.title: Exponential Value Growth
exponential.description: Each new bank doesn't just add linear value — it creates new connections with every existing member. Network value grows as n(n-1)/2.

netting.title: Better Netting Efficiency
netting.description: More participants = more offsetting flows = higher capital release. Our 85% efficiency improves as the network grows.

exponentialValue.title: Exponential Value Growth
exponentialValue.description: Each new bank doesn't just add linear value — it creates new connections with every existing member. Network value grows as n(n-1)/2.

nettingEfficiency.title: Better Netting Efficiency

networkEffect.cta: Early adopters gain maximum competitive advantage as they benefit from every subsequent member joining the network.

regulatoryFirst.title: Regulatory-First Expansion
regulatoryFirst.description: We don't "move fast and break things." Each market expansion begins with regulatory engagement, ensuring we meet local compliance requirements before launch.

partnerships.title: Strategic Partnership Model
partnerships.description: We partner with Tier 2 and Tier 3 banks who are hungry for growth and new clients. Unlike Tier 1 banks, they see immediate value in capital efficiency and competitive advantage through early adoption.

regulatory.title: Building for Regulatory Excellence
regulatory.subtitle: Parallel multi-market licensing strategy
regulatory.description: DelTran is pursuing multiple regulatory licenses simultaneously across key financial hubs. Our approach focuses on parallel market entry rather than sequential expansion, enabling faster global reach.
regulatory.intro: DelTran is pursuing multiple regulatory licenses simultaneously across key financial hubs. Our approach focuses on parallel market entry rather than sequential expansion, enabling faster global reach.

approach.title: Parallel Licensing Strategy
approach.description: We're not waiting for one license to complete before starting the next. Multiple teams are working simultaneously across different jurisdictions to accelerate our global expansion.

licenses.license: FSRA RegBox + Providing Money Services + FRT
licenses.coverage: 20+ countries through MENA and partner banks (UAE, Saudi Arabia, Bahrain, Qatar, Kuwait, Egypt, Jordan, Morocco, Turkey, and more)
licenses.details: Starting with ADGM RegBox regulatory sandbox to validate technology and compliance frameworks in a supervised environment

licenses.coverage: Full UAE domestic settlement coverage and corridors with Asia, India, Africa
licenses.details: Comprehensive UAE mainland licensing for domestic and cross-border operations

licenses.coverage: 30 countries (all EU states + Iceland, Norway, Liechtenstein)
licenses.details: Electronic Money Institution license with MiCA compliance enables passporting across entire EEA

licenses.coverage: UK and dependent territories (Gibraltar, Jersey, Isle of Man, partial BVI through partnerships)
licenses.details: FCA Electronic Money Regulations and Payment Services Regulations authorization

licenses.coverage: 50 US states + dependent territories (Guam, Puerto Rico)
licenses.details: Federal FinCEN registration plus state-level Money Transmitter Licenses

licenses.coverage: Southeast Asia — Singapore, Indonesia, Malaysia, Philippines, Thailand, Vietnam, Cambodia (through correspondents)
licenses.details: Major Payment Institution license for regional expansion

licenses.coverage: Hong Kong + China (through UnionPay/Alipay corridor), Taiwan
licenses.details: Stored Value Facility and Stablecoin Issuer licenses for Greater China access

licenses.coverage: All GCC countries (Saudi Arabia, Bahrain, Qatar, Oman, Kuwait, UAE)
licenses.details: Payment Service Provider licenses across Gulf Cooperation Council states

licenses.coverage: ~20 countries (Brazil, Mexico, Chile, Peru, Colombia, Argentina through local corridors)
licenses.details: Payment Institution and IFPE licenses for Latin American expansion

phase1.title: Foundation: ADGM RegBox Launch
phase1.description: Starting with ADGM regulatory sandbox as our foundation, while preparing applications for other jurisdictions in parallel.
items: Engage UK FCA for PSR/EMR licensing pathway
Begin US FinCEN registration and state MTL process

phase2.title: Parallel Multi-Market Expansion
phase2.description: Simultaneous licensing applications across multiple jurisdictions with dedicated regional teams.

phase3.title: Global Network Activation
phase3.description: Activating licenses across major financial hubs and expanding partner bank network.
items: GCC multi-country PSP licensing (SAMA, CBB, QCB)
Launch live corridors in each region

phase4.title: Emerging Markets & Network Effects
phase4.description: Expanding into high-growth emerging markets as network effects compound.
items: Central bank partnerships for settlement connectivity

regulatory.disclaimer: Important: DelTran is currently in pre-launch phase. We are not yet licensed as an Electronic Money Institution or Payment Service Provider in any jurisdiction. Our technology is designed to meet regulatory standards, and we are preparing to apply for necessary licenses. Timelines are subject to regulatory approvals and may vary by jurisdiction.

disclaimerCard.title: Important Regulatory Disclosure
disclaimerCard.content: DelTran is currently in pre-launch phase. We are not yet licensed as an Electronic Money Institution or Payment Service Provider in any jurisdiction. Our technology is designed to meet regulatory standards, and we are preparing to apply for necessary licenses. The timeline presented represents our strategic roadmap and is subject to regulatory approvals, which may vary by jurisdiction. All dates are estimates and may be adjusted based on regulatory requirements and approval timelines.

meta.title: Company - DelTran
meta.description: Learn about DelTran's mission to transform global settlement infrastructure through innovative technology and regulatory excellence.

hero.title: Building the Future
hero.subtitle: DelTran is on a mission to transform global settlement infrastructure through innovative technology and regulatory excellence.

mission.title: Mission
mission.content: Enable instant, efficient, and compliant settlement infrastructure for banks worldwide, freeing billions in locked capital and transforming how financial institutions move money.

vision.title: Vision
vision.content: A world where international payments move as fast as local ones, where settlement happens in seconds not days, and where every bank has access to global liquidity instantly.

story.title: Our Story
story.subtitle: Why we're building DelTran
story.content: Every day, billions sit frozen in correspondent banking accounts worldwide. Banks wait 2-5 days for settlements. Capital that could be working sits idle. And the technology to fix this already exists.

values.title: Our Values
values.subtitle: The principles that guide everything we do

security.title: Security First
security.description: Byzantine Fault Tolerant consensus, cryptographic audit trails, and compliance-first design ensure bank-grade security.

efficiency.title: Relentless Efficiency
efficiency.description: 85% capital release through multilateral netting. 6-second finality. Zero manual work for compliance reporting.

transparency.title: Radical Transparency
transparency.description: We're honest about our status, our roadmap, and our challenges. Trust is earned through transparency, not marketing hype.

innovation.title: Responsible Innovation
innovation.description: We don't move fast and break things. We build for regulatory excellence and institutional trust from day one.

careers.title: Join Us in Building the Future
careers.subtitle: We're looking for exceptional engineers, product leaders, and compliance experts who want to rebuild global financial infrastructure.
careers.description: If you're passionate about distributed systems, financial infrastructure, and doing things the right way, we want to hear from you.

cta.subtitle: Discover how DelTran can transform your banking operations

timing.title: The Perfect Storm
reasons: Central banks worldwide exploring settlement infrastructure modernization
Basel III capital requirements making correspondent banking increasingly expensive
Banks seeking cost reduction without system replacement risk
Byzantine Fault Tolerant consensus now mature and battle-tested
Regulatory acceptance of distributed settlement infrastructure growing

advantages.title: Network Effects
advantages.description: Every bank that joins makes the network more valuable for everyone. Exponential value creation.

advantages.title: Technical Barrier
advantages.description: Building Byzantine Fault Tolerant consensus for financial settlement requires years. We're already there.

advantages.title: Regulatory Positioning
advantages.description: Designed for compliance from day one. Built-in AML/CFT, ISO 20022, audit trails.

advantages.title: First-Mover in Infrastructure
advantages.description: Consumer fintech is crowded. Banking infrastructure is wide open. We're first.
